title: Crypt of Dark Secrets
overview: A witch resurrects a murdered Vietnam vet and takes revenge on his killers.
tagline: It Penetrates Beyond the Darkness of Sexual Possession ...

title: Lantern Festival Adventure
overview: The Jade Lantern Festival comes from a very old legend that commemorates the exploits of bandits.

title: Mr Sword
overview: It's losely based on "The Godfather" (1972).

title: I Come Alone
overview: When Sergeant Kruy is released from prison, a hitman is dispatched to kill him by Yan Yomarat, a kingpin in Korat. However, Kruy was a former mercenary himself, so he takes care of the hitman. He then decides to personally destroy Yan Yomarat's cartel...

title: Pashneh Tala
overview: After getting to know Shirin, Mehdi helps her to get Ata, who killed her father and is trying to take over the cabaret that belongs to Shirin with fake documents, out of her way. His brother Mahmoud, who studied medicine, returns to Iran, and takes an interest in his cousin Homa, who grew up with them since she was a child. The two decide to get married. But Mehdi's mother opposes Mahmoud's marriage with the argument that her eldest son should get married first.

title: The Gangster's Apprentice
overview: Crime film about a Copenhagen social worker who, out of boredom, seeks away from his environment and into the criminal underworld, which he soon becomes part of - with fatal consequences.

title: La Carmen
overview: A young ex-seminarian named José is doing his military service in Córdoba. There he meets Carmen, a beautiful flamenco dancer who falls madly in love, to the point that he steals to get money for her, so he will be imprisoned. José does not support the separation and, when he is driven by the Civil Guard on a train, he runs off by jumping out the window. He then left for Madrid in search of Carmen, who now lives in the company of his uncle, the lame, master of dancers. The woman welcomes José coldly, although they engage in a strange and tense relationship behind the back of El Morao, her former pimp, who lives with her again.

title: Al-Qadeya Al-Mashhora
overview: Jasser sneaks into Yassin's house to steal, but he senses a strange movement, as Saadia, the servant Ibrahim's wife, tries to find out who is in the house, so he kills her and Yassin. During that, Ibrahim arrives, and his daughter Naima testifies against him after seeing him holding a knife next to her mother's body, so he is imprisoned, and events escalate.

title: Samna
overview: Wealthy and influential Hindurao Dhonde Patil finds a homeless drunk, brings him home, looks after him, feeds him, finds a room for him, gets him employed, calls him Master, and even finds a woman to look after him. In return, this male steals from Hindurao, is apprehended by the local police, but Hindurao pays for his bail. Hindurao is forced to make a final decision about him after he finds out that Master has been inquiring about a missing army officer named Maruti Kamble.

title: Death In The Rain
overview: Balaash wants revenge on his accomplices who betrayed him...

title: Typhoons with Gentle Names
overview: The Bulgarian intelligence officer Emil Boev is residing in Bern, close to Bulgarian political emigrant Goranov. The Swiss and German women Rosemary and Flora are interested in him. Goranov is killed. Boev searches his apartment and finds few fake diamonds and the list of the spies in Bulgaria. Boev and the boss of a foreign intelligence service Benton are stuck in a bunker together. At the decisive moment, Flora appears and Boev manages to get away with the list of the spies. Boev is on the way to Bulgaria.

title: Yellow Is Not Just the Color of the Sun
overview: Ten-year-old Brigitte spends holiday with her father Peter on the Baltic Sea and everything is perfect until they meet strange and beautiful woman on the beach.

title: Chameleon
overview: A scathing portrait of the Hollywood/LA arts milieu of the late 70’s, Chameleon follows the amorphous day of its lead character, an Armani-jacketed peddler of high-class dope, fraudulent art, and preening postures suited-to-fit the changing victims, though as with all such fakery, the real victim in the long run is the person who lives such a life.

title: Verbrechen nach Schulschluß
overview: Report composed of three episodes about crimes in which students are involved: A disinterested classmate is harassed with nude photos; a fake kidnapping is intended to facilitate a jealous murder; rockers go on a "Hell's Angels" style rampage.

title: Kill Alex Kill
overview: Alex is a Vietnam veteran who, when he comes home, find out that his family has been murdered.
tagline: The first killing was a mistake... the second was not!

title: Priyo Bandhabi
overview: A woman runs away from her husband and is helped out by a homeless man.

title: The Ash Morning
overview: Ahmad Ramzi steals from a company's safe. But someone informs the police...

title: The Cyanide and the Raindrop
overview: Investigation into the death of a modest cashier.

title: ...So I Took It!
overview: Anti-shoplifting film co-produced by Sid Davis and Motorola.

title: Ohnsorg Theater - Frau Pieper lebt gefährlich
Quattro Delitti: Professione Farabutto
overview: Mario has just been released from prison for a crime he never acknowledged having committed. Back home, he once again crosses paths with the former friend who betrayed him. Tensions are high, tragedy is on the way.

title: The Silent File
overview: This detective story about three women who humiliate men.

title: Paco
overview: Paco is an orphaned Colombian boy who leaves the family farm to search for his uncle in the big big city. When he gets to the city, he discovers his uncle is running a gang of young jewel thieves.

title: Greedy Appetite
overview: After Tini catches her boyfriend Narno trying to seduce her sister Tina and ends their relationship, she mysteriously dies from a snakebite. Narno's mother then visits a shaman to place a curse on one of Tina's potential suitors. As all of that is going on, a mysterious murderer is lurking around bumping off other members of both Tina and Narno's families.

title: Tortured Over Sex
overview: A man has sex with a woman that he shouldn't. Her lover is a crime boss and owner of a white slave ring, and he is going to retaliate.

title: Revólver de Brinquedo
overview: Solitary young man, dominated by his mother, lives in a daydream. He buys a toy gun and impersonates a crime book personage.

title: Kuma
overview: There is a story about a German second wife brought from Germany to a village in Erzincan.

title: Awake in the City
overview: After finishing his medical studies, Nader goes back to Iran. He opens up a clinic in one of the rich neighborhoods, but after a while he gets bored with rich and pampered customers and decides to open a clinic in the slums.

title: Dress Your Flesh with Desire
overview: Greeksploitation, sexy crime thriller.

title: Gholam Zangi
overview: The Farman (Bahman Mofid), which is fond of dancing by the name of Aqdas (Shahnaz Tehrani). After knowing that his friend Gholam Zangi (Mohammad Reza Fazeli) is imprisoned at Ahvaz Prison, he visits him. The slave wants to be careful of the sweet (Saharnaz) rivals' sister Safdar (Farhad Hamidi), Kowsar (Ahmad Moeini) and Mamal (Mansour Sepehrnia) to marry him after release. Sweet who knows the slave as a man of Jafakari, gets acquainted with the mother of the commanding officer (Peridokht Iqbalpour), and after a while he gets married by decree. The slave is convinced by the command that he has commanded him, but the command after knowing that Shirin is the same slave candidate holds the marriage ceremony and abandons his life with the Aqdas .

title: Pourquoi Patricia?
overview: A young writer revisits the events leading up to the murder of the couple who were sheltering her.

title: Kill Two Birds
overview: Two female tourists are taken hostage by criminals who are chasing a man recently released from prison who knows the whereabouts of stolen money

title: Une Nuit en Amérique
overview: One night from which arise enigmatic corpses, police who understand nothing, improbable witnesses. Mysteries and inconsistencies are added to each other.

title: La hora del jaguar
overview: Police officer dismissed from the force for excessive use of force, is hired as a hitman for some unnamed shadow organization.

title: Story of a Murder
overview: Middle aged bourgeoisie couple lives a loveless life along with their beautiful eighteen year old daughter. The man has a passionate desire for the girl who in fact is not his real daughter but the fruit of an affair of the woman early in the marriage. This leads to tragic events.

title: Made in Iran
overview: Ali is a young boxer pursuing his dream of becoming a champion, but he's soon approached by a gangster. He gets involved--agreeing to follow their terms. He wins boxing matches and everything is going okay until they order him to lose a match.

title: Amigos para la aventura
overview: By mistake, three friends are chased across the country by a gang of criminals.

title: Submerged Reef
tagline: Set in 1964, spies try to put a bomb on a ship in its maiden trip to Afirca.

title: Eddie & Suzanne
overview: The former convicted Eddie from Oslo meet Suzanne, the daughter of a tyrannic Swedish police chief, in a discotheque by coincidence. Together they run off to France. The father starts the hunt for them, thinking they're doing drugs.

title: Too Easy to Kill
overview: A nurse deeply involved in the occult is hired to care for a wounded policeman who is secretly setting a trap for a cop-killer.

title: Mat Peci
overview: Mat Peci is a cold-blooded killer. He was forced to break up with his girlfriend, who was pregnant because his parents rejected him. He continued to find ways to meet the girl and was finally arrested because the police continued to follow his trail.

title: The place of smoke
overview: A touring theatre travelling through Uruguay soon turns into a melodrama, which in turn degenerates into an incredible police affair.

title: The Terrorist
overview: A girl from the slums happens to be the princess of a vast property.

title: Alex Joseph and His Wives
overview: A cop "drops out" and becomes a polygamist, ultimately taking on 12 wives, and begins his own town with his "family". The authorities are repulsed by his eccentric lifestyle, and he finds himself being investigated by them on charges of drug trafficking and fencing stolen property. Based on a true story.

title: El fugitivo de Puerto Rico
overview: Criminal womanizer Toño Bicicleta is still being persecuted by the law, but cannot ignore his hunger for new blood. Any false move could mean the difference between life and death.

title: Pasión por el peligro
overview: A beautiful woman, a member of a mafia gang, betrays the organization and escapes to the United States with a bag full of money.

title: Assassins
overview: Two men plan an assassination.

title: Paranóia
overview: Four thieves enter a house and terrorize a family.

title: We Came from the War
overview: Early years after the war. The bourgeoisie is falling, and they are being taxed for their profits during WWII. Abdyl is an accountt who helps the bourgeoisie and fascist collaborators by hiding their gold in his home and manipulating documents.

title: Give Me My Money
overview: Meiko is a young woman who is working out her issues concerning the relationship she had with her father by torturing and murdering men who look like him. After she kills the father of Maki and Yoshi (skinning him alive first), the two men coerce her into joining their planned bank robbery spree. The procedure for their heists is for Meiko and Yoshi to behave in such a bizarre manner that nobody in the bank notices it's being robbed. Things go well for them at first, but eventually their individual fears and neuroses start to get the better of them.

title: Las del talon
overview: At The Play Boy strip club, everybody's got a story. Owners, employees, customers...

title: Ranga Khush
overview: Widower Sultan Singh lives a poor lifestyle in a village in central India along with his son, Karma and daughter, Devi. The region of about 50 villages is being terrorized by a bandit named Ranga and there are only 50 Policemen, who are unable to apprehend him. After Sultan's death Karma decides to teach the villagers to defend themselves but is typecast as a rebel, arrested by the Police, and held in a cell. Ranga abducts a young lad, names him Ranga, and trains him to be a bandit. After Ranga passes away, the younger Ranga, mesmerized by the evil Ginnibai, takes over. Ranga abducts Devi, forces her to marry him to sire children who he will train to become Rangas of the future, as well as look after several abducted young children who he also plans to train and turn them also into future Rangas - and there is no mortal on Earth who can stop him.

title: Polk County Pot Plane
overview: Oosh and Boosh, two pot smoking hicks, meet up with Big Jim, who flies in drugs from Cuba and Colombia. Our heroes unload the plane and drive off, the only problem being that within about ten seconds of doing so, the police are on their tail. You've never met two more unlucky drugs couriers, as the police are on to them every time they try something, the mafia have changed management and want money back for lost shipments, and they're about to get stiffed for their biggest heist.

title: The Shore of Love
overview: A gang kidnaps a young couple.

title: The Knave
overview: Spanish crime film.

title: Il registratore
overview: The restlessness creeps into a claustrophobic situation where a typist confronts the recorded voice of the writer she works for.

title: Den perfekte tjuven
overview: A crime drama about a mysterious storehouse in the Hammarby harbor in Stockholm, based on a novel by Dan Tarchila.

title: Clouzot & C. contro Borsalino & C.
overview: The clash between two detectives and a crook.

title: Shankar Shambhu
overview: Inspector Ranjit Singh lives a middle-classed lifestyle along with his wife, Laxmi, a son, Pappu, and daughter, Pinky. When the National Bank is broken into one night, he gives chase to the robbers, and shoots one of them dead. The dead robber's brother, Kundan, manages to get away with the loot, then tracks down Ranjit and his family, shoots at them, forcing their jeep to fall into the Narbada river, separating the entire family. Ranjit manages to rescue Laxmi, and then apprehends Kundan, has him tried in Court, and sentenced to jail for several years, but is unable to recover the stolen loot. Years later, Kundan gets discharged and is received by his nephew, Chaman. Ranjit is now the Inspector General of Police, and Laxmi still hopes to be reunited with her children. Pappu has been adopted by a bandit named Lakhan Singh, who re-names him Shambhu, and brings him up with his other son, Shankar.
